summary: Implemented a new “My focus today” section component and rendered it above existing Programs page content. The section filters activities by current user + not archived and shows a compact upcoming events list with English empty states. Other Phase 2.1 requirements (ownership labels, mine-only filter, trust signals for Activity/Documentation mutations, timeline wording, and attachment download guardrails) are not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Make Activity ownership visible in Activities list cards (frontend/src/pages/activities/ActivitiesPage.tsx) and in Sprint Board activity cards (frontend/src/components/sprint/SprintBoardCard.tsx) by displaying an owner label resolved via user profiles.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence of changes to ActivitiesPage.tsx or SprintBoardCard.tsx to render owner labels or to query/resolve user profiles for display.
evidence: File diff summary lists modified files as ProgramsPage.tsx and adds MyFocusTodaySection.tsx; no mention of frontend/src/pages/activities/ActivitiesPage.tsx or frontend/src/components/sprint/SprintBoardCard.tsx

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a “Mine only” filter control to Activities page (frontend/src/pages/activities/ActivitiesPage.tsx) to filter by Activity.owner == current caller principal.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence of any new toggle/control or filtering logic added to ActivitiesPage.tsx.
evidence: File diff summary does not include frontend/src/pages/activities/ActivitiesPage.tsx changes

missing_requirements.requirement: Standardize trust signals for Activity and Documentation mutations (disabled/loading states, success/error toasts).
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows toast usage added/updated on ProgramsPage archive flow, but no evidence of updates to Activity create/update/status change flows or Documentation entry create/update flows.

missing_requirements.requirement: Improve timeline readability on Operational Visibility page by mapping known event types to human-readable English labels (frontend/src/pages/visibility/OperationalVisibilityPage.tsx).
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence of changes to OperationalVisibilityPage.tsx or any timeline label mapping utilities.
evidence: File diff summary does not include frontend/src/pages/visibility/OperationalVisibilityPage.tsx changes

missing_requirements.requirement: Add attachment download guardrails across UI surfaces that currently offer downloads; hide/disable failing download actions and show an English message that downloads are not available yet.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence of changes to attachment download/preview UI surfaces to disable/hide download actions or show guardrail messaging.
evidence: File diff summary does not show changes to attachment-related components/pages beyond adding MyFocusTodaySection and modifying ProgramsPage.tsx

hallucinated_features.description: Added success/error toasts and special unauthorized messaging for the Program archive flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest Phase 2.1 trust-signal requirement (REQ-5) explicitly calls out Activity and Documentation flows; Program archiving toast behavior is not requested in the requirements shown.
